title: [2005] The Best Of (Vol 1+2) - UB40 - 327mb @ 320kbs
description:
The Best Of (Volumes 1+2) - UB40 [2005]



This two CD set brings together both of UB40's "greatest hits" collections for the first time in one package. Known fortheir unique mix of pop and reggae, UB40 scored many UK topten hits throughout the eighties and nineties many of whichare featured here. Included are the UK number one singles 'Red Red Wine', 'I Got You Babe' - which featured Chrissie Hynde on vocals - and 1993's '(I Can't Help) Falling In Love With You'.
